description:

- Develop expansion plan, including finding and surveying location for new stores
- Lead the renovation project of the location, starting with the design, layout, until the outlet is Live and ready to serve the customers

- Review & monitor business / growth performance from each store to compare them with the feasibility study

And many more exciting challenges !


Architecture or Interior Design background is preferred.

description:
If you just click apply, you will not receive a response. You must follow the instructions below under 'how to apply' for our team to review and respond to your application. Complete and qualified applications receive a response within 24 hours.

SUMMARY OF OPPORTUNITY

  • Position: Young Professionals Fast Track
  • Location: Jakarta, Surabaya, Bandung, Semarang, Yogyakarta, Medan, or Lampung

Deliveree is seeking ambitious, hard working, and career-focused candidates with 6-24 months of full-time prior working experience (contract work is acceptable). All types of working experience are welcome to apply. We accept candidates with any kind of work experience and in any kind of company.

To qualify, you must have a strong interest in business or operations in a logistics technology environment. You must be willing to work very hard in a fast moving, accelerated environment with your career development as your top priority.

When you interview with us, you will be considered for assignment in several possible departments including: enterprise sales, digital marketing, operational excellence, supply chain management, booking operations, fleet training, fleet recruiting, telemarketing, finance, human resources, and administration.

You are encouraged to rotate to new departments once you have mastered your current assignment (this usually takes 2 years). While we expect you to be mobile and able to travel, your home base will be either our Jakarta HQ or satellite offices in Surabaya, Bandung, Semarang, Yogyakarta, Medan, or Lampung.

If this description excites you, please read our qualification requirements below and then follow the instructions carefully under HOW TO APPLY.

QUALIFICATIONS

  • Undergraduate GPA 3.0 or higher
  • 6-24 months of full-time work experience (contract work is acceptable)
  • Excellent English skills
  • Excellent speaking and writing skills
  • Self-motivated, independent, and hard-working
  • Strong reasoning, logic, and analysis skills

BENEFITS

  • Competitive monthly salary
  • Merit-based promotions
  • Full private healthcare coverage
  • Annual paid leave
  • 13th-month bonus
  • Daily lunch allowance
  • Monthly mobile data allowance
  • Remote working for 6 weeks every year. Available during Ramadan and Christmas

HOW TO APPLY

Submit the below items via email to christine@deliveree.com - If you submit all the required materials and your qualifications fit our search, you will hear back from us within 24 hours.

  1. Brief cover email
  2. PDF resume
  3. Completed pre-interview form
  4. University grades or transcript

Download Pre-Interview Form: https://dlvr.ee/YoungProfessionals

description:
If you just click apply, you will not receive a response. You must follow the instructions below under 'how to apply' for our team to review and respond to your application. Complete and qualified applications receive a response within 24 hours.

SUMMARY OF OPPORTUNITY

  • Rank: Associate/Senior Associate
  • Department: Digital Marketing
  • Reporting: Head of Marketing
  • Location: Kemang, South Jakarta
  • Experience: 1-3 years experience

JOB DESCRIPTION

Deliveree is a fast moving, rapidly growing, and very successful logistics technology company that is changing the cargo and trucking industry in Indonesia to reduce waste, grow the economy, create jobs, and make Indonesia more competitive.

We are currently seeking a seasoned Senior Digital Marketing Associate with specialized experience in digital marketing, social media management, and engagement campaigns. If you have 1-3 years of full-time working experience, a passion for driving impactful digital marketing initiatives, and willingness to work very hard in a fast-moving & accelerated environment with your career development as your top priority, we want to hear from you.

As a Digital Marketing Associate, you will play a crucial role in shaping and implementing our digital marketing strategies across platforms and social media. You will also be in charge of our conversion and retargeting funnels.

If this description excites you, please read our qualification requirements below and then follow the instructions carefully under HOW TO APPLY.

QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in any major with a minimum CGPA of 3.00/4.00.
  • 1-3 years of full-time working experience in launching, executing and reporting digital ad funnels.
  • Experience with marketing technology implementation such as events tracker, pixel implementation & Google Tags Manager
  • Basic understanding of different marketing attribution models (last-click, first interaction etc), marketing funnel and customer journey stages
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to derive actionable insights from data.
  • Attention to detail
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative work environment.

BENEFITS

  • Competitive monthly salary
  • Merit-based promotions
  • Full private healthcare coverage
  • Annual paid leave
  • 13th-month bonus
  • Daily lunch allowance
  • Monthly mobile data allowance
  • Remote working for 6 weeks every year. Available during Ramadan and Christmas

HOW TO APPLY

Submit the below items via email to christine@deliveree.com - If you submit all the required materials and your qualifications fit our search, you will hear back from us within 24 hours.

  1. Brief cover email
  2. PDF resume
  3. Completed pre-interview form
  4. University grades or transcript

description:
IT Infrastructure & Security Lead is responsible for the implementation and operations of all technology infrastructures which includes data center, network and server services, telephony, service monitoring, user support/help desk, workstation management, servers, storage, and related software. This position is operationally responsible for ensuring the availability, integrity, and security of all IT systems and infrastructure.

Job Descriptions :


  • Planning, project management and implementation leadership, identifying opportunities for automation, cost savings, and service quality improvement.
  • Provides infrastructure services vision, enables innovation and seeks to leverage IT trends that can create business value consistent with the company‚Äôs requirements and expectations.
  • Development of enterprise standards and technology architecture and the IT operations governance process.
  • Conduct product and vendor evaluations ensuring best in class technologies and partners
  • Securing applications created and used by companies, by conducting analysis, testing, and providing improvement feedback to developers, related to security in applications used by companies
  • Ensure security against all attack surfaces related to applications created and used by the company

Requirements :


  • Have experience as a team lead for at least 3-5 years
  • Experience of leading overall infrastructure for a complex organization and network, VLAN setup for regulatory requirements, managing data protection, etc.
  • Working knowledge of ERP Infrastructure
  • Working knowledge of Storage Area Network (SAN) and related technologies, network communications technology, High availability and disaster recovery architecture, communication and related technologies
  • Exposure to ITIL concepts and adoption.
  • Experience with regulatory compliance issues, as well best practices in application and network security.
  • Experience in all technical aspects of Network Security Engineering
  • Understand and have knowledge of cloud infrastructures (AWS, Alibaba, Azure, or GCP)
  • Understand and have knowledge of on-premise infrastructures
  • Experience in technical aspects of Cloud Security
  • Preferable having cloud certification
  • Must have at least 3 security system certificates
  • Must have at least 5 vulnerability report certificates from companies that have been acknowledged for their reporting
title: Lead IT Infrastructure & Security

description:

  • Experienced in one/more of these programming languages/platforms: Golang, Python, and database tech: SQL, PostgreSQL.

description:
We are looking for resourceful, enthusiastic, and driven Business Development who are ready to spread their wings in the digital world. A Business Development plays a strategic role in growing the business at BDD. You will supply qualified leads of prospective clients by pitch our product and bring the value proposition that we can offer to them.

Responsibilities:

  • Support Boleh Dicoba Digital (BDD)'s creative business development efforts, focusing on client acquisition and growth opportunities.
  • Collaborate with the core creative team and other departments to develop innovative strategies and solutions for clients.
  • Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends, consumer insights, and competitive landscape in the digital marketing industry.
  • Assist in the creation and management of comprehensive business proposals, presentations, and pitches to potential clients.
  • Actively participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute creative ideas for marketing campaigns and initiatives.
  • Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients, ensuring exceptional customer service and satisfaction
  • Stay up-to-date with industry best practices, emerging technologies, and digital marketing trends
  • Lead client meetings, presentations, and negotiations, showcasing BDD's capabilities and services.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Business, or a related field.
  • Proven experience in business development, sales, or marketing within the creative industry.
  • Solid understanding of digital marketing channels, trends, and technologies.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify opportunities and provide data-driven recommendations.
  • Proficiency in presentation software, project management tools, and Microsoft Office Suite.
  • Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
  • Positive attitude, self-motivated, and adaptable to changing priorities.
  • Ability to effectively communicate and articulate creative concepts, strategies, and business ideas to clients and internal teams
  • Strong presentation skills with the ability to present complex information in a clear and compelling manner.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills to create persuasive proposals and understand client requirements and translate them into actionable strategies.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including creative, marketing, and account management, to deliver exceptional results
  • Proactively identify client needs, provide strategic recommendations, and propose innovative solutions.
title: Account Executive (Creative Services)

About KIQS

KIQS is a leading Southeast Asia's learning platform powered by trusted and accredited educational partners around the world.

Our platform is designed to help families access quality learning experiences with ease.

Whether you're looking for a reliable & cost-effective platform to understand your child's development or accelerate your child's holistic development with progressive technology for a hyper personalized learning experience; KiQS has got you covered.

KIQS provides digital learning materials, worksheets and hands-on activities from the world's best international schools.
title: Full Stack Developer (Junior to Mid-level)

description:
Requirement:

  • Must have work experience for 5+ years as Network Engineer or Infrastructure Engineer
  • Have deep understanding and working experience in implementing virtualization technologies (VMWare/ESXi/ Vsphere, Hyper-V, VirtualBox, Citrix, Microsoft)
  • Have working experience in handling hardwares like servers and storage (sizing, OS installation, setup/configuration, and troubleshooting).
  • Have a good understanding of backup and recovery solutions (Veeam, Veritas, Informix), a working knowledge would be an advantages.
  • Have experience working with major firewall platforms (Palo Alto, Juniper, Cisco, Fortinet, etc). A certificate for any of the platforms is a plus.
  • Have a good knowledge of networking ‚Äì either classic (switching, dynamic routing protocols, static and rule-based routing, etc.) or cloud (VPC, peering, gateways, SD-WAN secure fabric). A certificate in any networking area is a plus.
  • Have a good knowledge of encryption and tunneling protocols (PKI, IPSec, SSL VPN, TLS, IKE, IKEv2, etc.)
  • Understand application protocols in the context of OSI network layers and content inspection (Load-balancing, WAF, IPS, IDS, etc.)
  • Have good verbal and written communication skills (English) in both technical and non-technical communications.
  • Have good experience creating design documents (HLD, LLD), diagrams, and presentations (PPT)
  • Have a good analytical mindset for problem-solving under stress and time pressure.

Responsibles:

  • Attending meetings and workshop with the client and/or principal to understand requirements, challenges and risks
  • Architecting & developing infrastructure technology solutions in cooperation with various teams using existing industry standard and best practices
  • Aligning all those solutions to suit in company line of products and/ or services offered
  • Creating design and support documentation for the delivered services with adherence to the client‚Äôs processes and procedures
  • Perform daily duties as per the client‚Äôs project requirements such as infrastructure deployment, configuration, and support.
  • Involved throughout infrastructure testing, creating testing documentation and completion reports.

description:
Company: Fintech News Network

Interested in the fintech industry? Want to be able to work remotely from the comfort of your own home? Would you like to play a part in this rapidly evolving industry?

The Fintech News Network

The Fintech News Network covers stories and startups in the fintech ecosystem ‚Äì i.e. mobile payment, personal finance, bitcoin, blockchain, robo advisory and lending. We run major fintech hub pages around the world, including Singapore, Switzerland, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Philippines, Baltic/Nordics, Middle East/Africa and America. We are a lean team operating out of more than 5 hubs and growing.

Day to Day Responsibilities:

  • Work closely with the editor to manage content on Fintech News Network's Switzerland, Middle East, Africa, Nordics, Baltics and America publications.
  • Highly skilled at writing and editing press announcements in the region.
  • Curate topics based on the latest fintech trends and proactively proposing content ideas to the editor.
  • Produce creative captions for Social media and sponsored posts
  • Analyse web and social media traffic to understand audience‚Äôs preferences to improve content production and management.

Qualifications Required:

  • Ability to work independently.
  • Strong attention to details.
  • Able to adopt SEO‚Äôs best practices in your writing.
  • Familiarity with Photoshop or any design skills are encouraged
  • German is a plus

Interested? Send your CV to jobs@fintechnews.sg

description:
About Us

Ematic Solutions is a marketing and technology consultancy that helps B2C companies build a fully integrated, high-ROI digital ecosystem. We are a team of digital marketers, engineers, designers, copywriters, operations specialists, and customer success practitioners spread across the world.

We‚Äôre entrepreneurial team players who take personal accountability for our business, our customers and ourselves.

What's The Gig?

  • Apply your knowledge and experience in a real business setting in a tech startup
  • Be part of challenging assignments and internal projects
  • Assist in any customer/technical support related matter
  • Perform other related functions that may be assigned by your manager
  • Responsible for ad-hoc assignment, function and other related duties specified by your manager

What we‚Äôre looking for

  • Available for a full time internship (minimum 3 months or 6 months, paid internship)
  • Preferably fresh graduate / currently pursuing a Bachelor or higher Degree in Information Technology in a recognized institution of higher learning, with good academic achievements
  • A fast and continuous learner, especially in this fast changing technology driven environment
  • Detail oriented and highly organized
  • Ability to prioritize, multi-task, and perform effectively under pressure

  • A good team player and aims to continue improving with the team and also able to work within and cross departments

What We Offer

  • Be exposed to and grow your knowledge across the Digital Marketing ecosystem, including Performance Marketing, SEO, Content Marketing, CRM and more
  • Competitive pay with an attractive, long-term compensation model
  • A flat and open culture that nurtures entrepreneurism and wants to unlock the best version of you.
